document_data.name: Shanjan Kwan
document_data.mainbody: '''Shanjan Kwan''' was a [[spellcaster]] who lived in the region of the [[Sword Coast North]] near [[Phandalin]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Upon his forehead was a glyph depicting the symbol of the [[necromancy]] school of [[magic]].
document_data.Personality:
Due to his unique experiences as a baby, Shanjan believed that he had cheated death, even going so far to suspect he may be a [[god]].

He did not take things for face value and always investigated further when presented with a mystery.
document_data.History: Shanjan tragically died when he just a mere infant. Fortunately, he was [[raise dead|raised from the dead]] and continued to live on for some time.
